Utils para descargar archivos

{% raw %}

download_file[source]

download_file(directory:Union[str, Path], source_url:str, decompress:bool=False)

Download data from source_ulr inside directory.

Parameters

directory: str, Path Custom directory where data will be downloaded. source_url: str URL where data is hosted. decompress: bool Wheter decompress downloaded file. Default False.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Todos los datasets se heredarían de esta dataclass que tiene los atributos que queremos

{% raw %}

class TimeSeriesDataset[source]

TimeSeriesDataset(S:DataFrame, X:DataFrame, Y:DataFrame, idx_categorical_static:Optional[List[T]]=None, groups:Optional[Dict[str, array]]=None)

Args: S (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame of static features of shape (n_time_series, n_features). X (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame of exogenous variables of shape (sum n_periods_i for i=1..n_time_series, n_exogenous). Y (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame of target variable of shape (sum n_periods_i for i=1..n_time_series, 1). idx_categorical_static (list, optional): List of categorical indexes of S. groups (dict, optional): Dictionary of groups. Example: {'Yearly': ['Y1', 'Y2']}

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Información meta de Turismo

{% raw %}

class Yearly[source]

Yearly(seasonality:int=1, horizon:int=4, freq:str='D', rows:int=2, name:str='Yearly')

Yearly(seasonality: int = 1, horizon: int = 4, freq: str = 'D', rows: int = 2, name: str = 'Yearly')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Quarterly[source]

Quarterly(seasonality:int=4, horizon:int=8, freq:str='Q', rows:int=3, name:str='Quarterly')

Quarterly(seasonality: int = 4, horizon: int = 8, freq: str = 'Q', rows: int = 3, name: str = 'Quarterly')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Monthly[source]

Monthly(seasonality:int=12, horizon:int=24, freq:str='M', rows:int=3, name:str='Monthly')

Monthly(seasonality: int = 12, horizon: int = 24, freq: str = 'M', rows: int = 3, name: str = 'Monthly')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class TourismInfo[source]

TourismInfo(groups:Tuple=(<class 'nixtla.data.datasets.Yearly'>, <class 'nixtla.data.datasets.Quarterly'>, <class 'nixtla.data.datasets.Monthly'>))

TourismInfo(groups: Tuple = (<class 'nixtla.data.datasets.Yearly'>, <class 'nixtla.data.datasets.Quarterly'>, <class 'nixtla.data.datasets.Monthly'>))

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Tourism[source]

Tourism(S:DataFrame, X:DataFrame, Y:DataFrame, idx_categorical_static:Optional[List[T]]=None, groups:Optional[Dict[str, array]]=None) :: TimeSeriesDataset

Args: S (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame of static features of shape (n_time_series, n_features). X (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame of exogenous variables of shape (sum n_periods_i for i=1..n_time_series, n_exogenous). Y (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame of target variable of shape (sum n_periods_i for i=1..n_time_series, 1). idx_categorical_static (list, optional): List of categorical indexes of S. groups (dict, optional): Dictionary of groups. Example: {'Yearly': ['Y1', 'Y2']}

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
tourism_dataset = Tourism.load('data')
{% endraw %}

Si se necesita un grupo en particular se usa el método get_group.

{% raw %} 
tourism_dataset_yearly = tourism_dataset.get_group('Yearly')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

1 Y1 1980-12-31 24271.5134
